<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>All items used to electronically connect computer and network devices. This includes fiber or copper wire, Panduit, conduit, ladder racks, struts, fiber splice cases and connectors, wall plates, punch down blocks, distribution panels, wire ties, telephone poles, etc.
a. ISP – Inside Plant or wiring inside of a building b. OSP - Outside Plant or wiring outside of a building</description> <material_category>Cabling Items (ISP/OSP)</material_category> <number>HWCAT0001003</number> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-01 19:05:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9f69ce0b13bca380f60ebccf3244b0cb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-01 19:05:26</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories> </record_update>
